text.div:
NapkonVaccination

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://www.napkon.de/fhir/ImplementationGuide/napkon-vaccination

resource.name: Additional Vaccination Willingness
resource.description: Response to AdditionalVaccinationWillingnessQuestionnaire

resource.name: Allergic Reaction To Vaccination
resource.description: Whether a vaccination caused an allergic reaction

resource.name: Analgesic Antipyretic Intake After Vaccination
resource.description: Whether a patient took analgesic or antipyretic drugs after a vaccination event

resource.name: Body Temperature After Vaccination
resource.description: Maximal body temperature after a vaccination event (indicating fever)

resource.name: COVID-19 Encounter
resource.description: Whether a patient underwent medical treatment for COVID-19

resource.name: COVID-19 Immunization
resource.description: COVID-19 immunization event

resource.name: COVID-19 Oxygen Therapy
resource.description: Indicating whether a COVID-19 patient received an oxygen therapy

resource.name: Chemotherapy
resource.description: Whether a patient is or has been receiving a chemotherapy within the last 3 months

resource.name: General Complaints After Vaccination
resource.description: General complaints after a vaccination event

resource.name: Immunomodulatory Therapy
resource.description: Whether a patient is receiving an immunosuppressive or -modulatory therapy

resource.name: Medical Treatment For Vaccination Adverse Reaction
resource.description: Whether a patient underwent medical treatment for a potential or actual adverse reaction to a vaccination event

resource.name: Regular Alcohol Intake
resource.description: Whether a patient regularly drinks alcohol

resource.name: Regular Alcohol Intake Quantity
resource.description: How many alcoholic drinks a patient usually drinks per day

resource.name: SARS CoV2 Infection
resource.description: Profile to capture the diagnosis of disease caused by 2019 novel coronavirus.

resource.name: SARS CoV2 Variant
resource.description: Variant/strain of detected SARS CoV2 (Pango Cov-lineage)

resource.name: Vaccination Injection Site Erythema
resource.description: Size of an erythema at a vaccine injection site

resource.name: Vaccination Injection Site Pain
resource.description: Pain intensity at vaccine injection site at rest or movement

resource.name: Vaccination Injection Site Swelling
resource.description: Size of an swelling at a vaccine injection site

resource.name: Analgesics Antipyretics
resource.description: Analgetic and antipyretic drugs

resource.name: COVID-19 Vaccination Contraindications
resource.description: Contraindications precluding COVID-19 vaccination

resource.name: COVID-19 Vaccination Reasons
resource.description: Individual reason for getting vaccinated against COVID-19

resource.name: COVID-19 Vaccine Codes
resource.description: COVID-19 Vaccine Codes (vaccines approved in the European Union)

resource.name: CTCAE Grade Value Set
resource.description: CTCAE Grades 0 through 5. The grade of the adverse event, determined by CTCAE criteria, where 0 represents confirmation that the given adverse event did NOT occur, and 5 represents death. Note that grade 0 events are generally not reportable, but may be created to give positive confirmation that the clinician assessed or considered a particular AE.

resource.name: Complaint Intensity
resource.description: Intensity of general complaints

resource.name: Detected Not Detected Unknown Undetermined
resource.description: Values for laboratory observations

resource.name: Encounter Ambulatory Emergency Inpatient
resource.description: ValueSet to determine the encounter type of a patient

resource.name: Encounter HomeHealth Ambulatory Inpatient
resource.description: ValueSet to determine the encounter type of a patient

resource.name: General Complaints After Vaccination
resource.description: General complaints after vaccination

resource.name: Immunosuppressive Immunomodulatory Therapy
resource.description: Immunosuppressive and immunomodulatory procedures / therapies codes

resource.name: Pain Provoking Factor
resource.description: Pain provoking factors

resource.name: Present Not Present Undetermined Other
resource.description: Values for laboratory observations

resource.name: RestrictedEventStatus
resource.description: EventStatus value set restricted to codes not-done, active, completed and unknown

resource.name: Severity Grading
resource.description: Scale to grade the severity of an outcome/condition/observation

resource.name: Yes No Unknown
resource.description: Yes / No / Unknown

resource.name: CTCAE Grade Code System
resource.description: Common terminology criteria (CTC) grades associated with the severity of an adverse event, expressed as integers, 0 through 5, with 0 representing no adverse event, and 5 representing death.

resource.name: NAPKON Vaccination Module Codes
resource.description: NAPKON Vaccination Module Code System - Collection of vaccination module-specific codes that are missing from common terminologies such as SNOMED CT

resource.name: Additional Vaccination Willingness
resource.description: Example of a subject who is willing to receive an additional COVID-19 vaccination if it is officially recommended

resource.name: Additional Vaccination Willingness
resource.description: Willingness of the patient to receive additional COVID-19 vaccination if officially recommended

resource.name: Allergic Reaction To Vaccination Instance
resource.description: Example of an undetermined state of an allergic reaction cause by a vaccine

resource.name: Allergic Reaction To Vaccination Instance
resource.description: Example of a free-text answer to an allergic reaction caused by vaccination

resource.name: Analgesic Antipyretic Intake After Vaccination
resource.description: Example of an antipyretic drug taken after a vaccination event

resource.name: Body Temperature After Vaccination
resource.description: Example of a not measured body temperature after vaccination

resource.name: Body Temperature After Vaccination
resource.description: Example of an elevated body temperature after vaccination

resource.name: Body Temperature After Vaccination
resource.description: Example of an elevated body temperature after vaccination

resource.name: Medical Treatment For Vaccination Adverse Reaction
resource.description: Example of a patient hospitalized for a potential or actual adverse reaction to a vaccination event

resource.description: Example of a COVID-19 patient who received an oxygen therapy

resource.name: COVID-19 Vaccination Done
resource.description: Example of a patient having received a vaccination

resource.name: COVID-19 Vaccination Not Done
resource.description: Example of a patient not receiving a vaccination due to pregnancy

resource.name: COVID-19 Vaccination Not Done Reason Other
resource.description: Example of a patient not receiving a vaccination due to a specified (free-text) 'other reason'

resource.name: Chemotherapy
resource.description: Example of a patient not receiving chemotherapy during the last 3 months

resource.name: ExamplePatient
resource.description: Example patient to be used as reference in other instances

resource.name: General Complaints After Vaccination
resource.description: Example of a chill after a vaccination event

resource.name: Immunomodulatory Therapy
resource.description: Example of a patient receiving an immunosuppresive therapy

resource.name: Immunomodulatory Therapy
resource.description: Example of a patient not receiving an immunosuppresive therapy

resource.name: Medical Treatment For Vaccination Adverse Reaction
resource.description: Example of a patient treated in the mergency room or by a general practitioner for a potential or actual adverse reaction to a vaccination event

resource.name: Medical Treatment For Vaccination Adverse Reaction
resource.description: Example of a patient hospitalized for a potential or actual adverse reaction to a vaccination event

resource.name: Regular Alcohol Intake
resource.description: Example of a patient who drinks a single drink per week

resource.name: Regular Alcohol Intake
resource.description: Example of a patient who drinks at least 4 drinks per week

resource.description: Example of a patient for whom the alcohol intake is unknown

resource.name: Regular Alcohol Intake
resource.description: Example of a patient who does no longer drink alcohol

resource.name: Regular Alcohol Intake Quantity
resource.description: Example of intake of 5 or more alcoholic beverages per day

resource.name: Regular Alcohol Intake Quantity
resource.description: Example of a patient for whom the quantity is unknown

resource.description: Example of a patient with a SARS CoV2 infection

resource.description: Example of a patient without SARS CoV2 infection

resource.name: SARS CoV2 Infection
resource.description: Example of an unknown SARS CoV2 infection

resource.name: SARS CoV2 Variant
resource.description: Example of a SARS CoV2 variant (Pango lineage)

resource.description: Example of a 2.5-5 cm erythema at a vaccine injection site

resource.name: Vaccination Injection Site Pain Rest
resource.description: Example of mild pain at vaccine injection site at rest and movement

resource.description: Example of a 5.1-10 cm swelling at a vaccine injection site
